framework.core.mvc.model

Class BaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.mvc.model.BaseModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, ISerializable<java.lang.String>, IXMLCodec, ISignalListener, IRenderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectModel, PropertiesModel, TileLayerModel, TileMapModel, TileModel

    public abstract class BaseModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel, IRenderable
    The base model representation of all models in the application
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>
